string-array.name: data_description
string-array.item: The Los Angeles Lakers are a professional basketball team based in Los Angeles. They are one of the most successful teams in the history of the NBA.
The Milwaukee Bucks are a professional basketball team based in Milwaukee, Wisconsin. They are a member of the Central Division of the Eastern Conference in the National Basketball Association (NBA).
The Chicago Bulls are a professional basketball team based in Chicago, Illinois. They are a member of the Central Division of the Eastern Conference in the National Basketball Association (NBA).
The Boston Celtics are a professional basketball team based in Boston, Massachusetts. They are one of the most successful franchises in NBA history.
The Miami Heat are a professional basketball team based in Miami, Florida. They compete in the Southeast Division of the Eastern Conference in the National Basketball Association (NBA).
The Dallas Mavericks are a professional basketball team based in Dallas, Texas. They are a member of the Southwest Division of the Western Conference in the National Basketball Association (NBA).

The Brooklyn Nets are a professional basketball team based in Brooklyn, New York City. They are a member of the Atlantic Division of the Eastern Conference in the National Basketball Association (NBA).

The Toronto Raptors are a professional basketball team based in Toronto, Ontario, Canada. They are a member of the Atlantic Division of the Eastern Conference in the National Basketball Association (NBA).
The Philadelphia 76ers are a professional basketball team based in Philadelphia. They compete in the Atlantic Division of the Eastern Conference in the National Basketball Association (NBA).
The San Antonio Spurs are a professional basketball team based in San Antonio, Texas. They are one of the most successful franchises in NBA history.
